data.eml:eml: A revision of the genus Muricea Lamouroux, 1821 (Anthozoa, Octocorallia) in the eastern Pacific. Part I: Eumuricea Verrill, 1869 revisited

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Breedy, Odalisca, Guzman, Hector M. (2015): A revision of the genus Muricea Lamouroux, 1821 (Anthozoa, Octocorallia) in the eastern Pacific. Part I: Eumuricea Verrill, 1869 revisited. ZooKeys 537: 1-32, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.537.6025, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.537.6025
